CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get --quiet --yes install         build-essential pkg-config curl wget          software-properties-common gcc-multilib          libglib2.0-dev zlib1g-dev         dh-autoreconf bison flex &&         apt-get autoremove -y &&         apt-get clean &&         rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl http://wiki.qemu-project.org/download/qemu-2.7.0-rc1.tar.bz2 -sSf > qemu-2.7.0-rc1.tar.bz2 &&         tar -jxf qemu-2.7.0-rc1.tar.bz2 &&         cd qemu-2.7.0-rc1 &&         mkdir build && cd build &&         ../configure --target-list=arm-softmmu,arm-linux-user,x86_64-linux-user,x86_64-softmmu &&         make -j 12 && make install &&         cd ../ && rm -rf qemu-*
Commands.Name: run
